aboutpage-description.part-one: Hi! I'm Agata. I've recently finished 6month coding bootcamp and I can proudly call myself a junior full-stack developer. My studies major was architecture and I've been working as an architect for 4 years until I've decided to completely switch my career path. I've always liked building things, getting to the core of problems and solving it. I have strong analytical skills and I am friendly and cooperative. My architectural background turned out to be a huge help in coding, since I can easily organize my work, split complicated tasks into small bites and I know how to meet a deadline.
aboutpage-description.part-two: I am really fascinated by coding, AI and how that's gonna influence programming and our lives and I want to be on the tech side of the fence. Click the button below to see my tech stack and if You want to get in touch, I am always one message away.

projectspage-projects.project-one-description: Fullstack app created as my bootcamp graduation project. Registered users can put stuff they don't need and swap it with others. All for sustainability! Frontend is build with React/Redux and MUI. Backend is using Node.js/Express with MongoDB, authentication via bcrypt + JWT and socket.io for messaging between users.
projectspage-projects.project-two-description: Fullstack application developed as a bootcamp project. Frontend build with React/Redux and Bootstrap. Backend is using Node.js/Express, MongoDB. Later I've added authentication with bcrypt + JWT and cloudinary for picture upload.
projectspage-projects.project-three-description: Fullstack application developed in a team of 3 as a bootcamp project. Build with Typescript, React/Redux, Mui/Bootstrap and socket.io-client on Frontend side. Backend used Node.js+Express, MongoDB, bcrypt + JWT, socket.io, Oauth+google.
projectspage-projects.project-four-description: Frontend webpage I've designed and developed to present some of my works. Created in React with MUI. Translation is provided through i18next library.

contactpage-subheader.part-one: have a question or want to work together? feel free to write to me directly on
